project_descr: The project will improve the coordination of efforts to respond to the crisis, while at the same time developing a recovery framework based on a comprehensive needs analysis and an action plan for priority activities.

outputs.output_descr: To improve the coordination of efforts to respond to the crisis, while at the same time developing a recovery framework based on a comprehensive needs analysis and an action plan for priority activities.
